headline: Leidos Holdings, Inc. Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: Leidos Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: LDOS) announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.40 per outstanding share of the company's common stock. The cash dividend is payable on Sept. 30, 2025, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on Sept 15, 2025.

headline: Will Leidos (LDOS) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Leidos (LDOS) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.
